name: Installation 1969
description:
Installation 1969 Controls

Arrow keys - drive tank
Z / C / N - fire weapon
X / V / M - switch between cannon and machinegun

Rules

Survive 99 seconds.
Tank must survive.
Crystal must survive.

Story

Installation 1969, planet Phobos, is the location of a science experiment gone wrong. All that's standing between the Federation of Earth and it's citizens is you (the mess hall lady), and the site's custodians, who commandeered a tank! Hold out for long enough so that backup can arrive, and a clean sweep may commence!

Development

Made this for LOWREZJAM 2022. Huge thanks to:

  • Ildi
  • Balint
  • Ati
